snippet: Nick Krause explains why his character, Sid, in "The Descendants" is not really a stoner and why getting hit by Robert Forster was rather enjoyable.
abstract: Nick Krause explains why his character, Sid, in "The Descendants" is not really a stoner and why getting hit by Robert Forster was rather enjoyable.

headline.main: Sid in 'The Descendants' and Why Getting Punched Is Fun
